metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40898 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue discovered in Python Packaging Authority (PyPA) Wheel 0.37.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via attacker controlled input to wheel cli.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the python-pip package bundles wheel binaries when built. After updating wheel, a no-change rebuild of python-pip is required.

criterions.comment: python-pip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
wheel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
